setting: Mars Colony 'Ares Prime', a fragile dome habitat battered by dust storms, where resource scarcity drives tension.

characters.name: Commander Lewis
characters.goal: Keep the colony alive until the supply ship arrives

characters.name: Dr. Aris
characters.goal: Prove that the Martian soil can sustain mutant crops

characters.name: Unit TARS
characters.goal: Optimize resource allocation at all costs
